description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5.00m in depth, maximum height of 3.10m and eaves height of 3.00m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension and alterations are not considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under schedule 2, Part 1, Class A.1 (j) (iii) of the Town and County Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015

The assessment has been based on the original layout of the house which shows an existing bay to the rear. The proposed extension would therefore extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A.1 (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

For the sake of the addition of the proposed works to your application, kindly note that the submitted application will have to be amended and resubmitted. In addition please outline the proposed plans which you wish to be considered as part of this application, so that previous ones can be superceded
